participant_1.background:
I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't.
I love to read books because it transports me to another world and I can forget about my troubles.
I was single for a long time before I met my current boyfriend.
my brother thinks he is a viking.
i m an only child.

participant_2.background:
My longest relationship was two years long, but I ended it because I felt like we were going in different directions.
i take pride in getting straight a s.
I went hiking and swimming last time I was on vacation.
I haven't seen my family in years, but I'd love to buy a mobile for their nursery.
I went on a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends.

content.text: I like to read, cook, and travel. I also like to go on quilting retreats with my friends.
I love to read too! I recently read a book about a woman who was trying to find her way in the world. It was really inspiring.
That sounds really interesting. I love to read books that make me think about my own life.
Yes, I have a brother. He's the best!
I'm an only child. I always wish I had a sibling to play with when I was growing up.
My brother and I used to fight all the time, but now we're best friends.
I'm glad you two are close. I know how important it is to have a sibling to lean on.
Thanks! What are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go hiking or go to the beach.
That sounds like fun! I'm going to go hiking with my friends
